Package Listeners

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddListener
    Gets name of stream to add from user and adds it to the list/GUI
    ContextMenuListener  
    DeselectListener
    Waits for hovers on JLabel to set deselect properties
    ExitListener
    Closes the program when the close button on the main GUI View is pressed
    GameListener
    Updates the game list document actively while the user types into the search text field
    GameSelectListener
    Sets the specified game that is searched for and clicked as the game filter
    HeaderListener  
    MinListener
    Minimizes the main GUI View when the minimize button is pressed
    MoveListener  
    RemoveStreamListener
    Removes selected stream when 'remove stream' context menu option is clicked
    ResizeListener
    Changes display panel size when resizing the GUI to match with overall GUI layout
    SearchListener
    Opens and shows search text bar when search icon is clicked
    SelectListener
    Waits for clicks/hovers on JLabel to set select properties Also handles context menu clicks
    SettingsListener
    Opens Settings GUI when settings button is pressed on main GUI
    WindowExitListener
    On program termination, records the window size and screen location to be saved and loaded on next start up
